price: Sebenarnya, pengetahuan mereka tentang akhirat tidak sampai (ke sana), malahan mereka ragu-ragu tentang akhirat itu, lebih-lebih lagi mereka buta darinya.
arabic: بَلِ ٱدَّٰرَكَ عِلۡمُهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي شَكّٖ مِّنۡهَاۖ بَلۡ هُم مِّنۡهَا عَمُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: bali iddāraka ʿil'muhum fī al-ākhirati bal hum fī shakkin min'hā bal hum min'hā ʿamūna
